Therefore , initiate TOPCARE-DCM - trial ( Transplantation Of Progenitor Cells And Recovery Left Ventricular Function Patients non ischemic Dilatative CardioMyopathy ) aim regionally improve leave ventricular contractility selective infusion BMC leave anterior descend coronary artery . Patients randomize 2:1 ( 20/10 ) BMC Infusion versus standard medical therapy
